trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event occurs just before a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>evento ocorre antes de um formulário é fechado, por utilizador, através da interface de utilizador (IU), ou através de programação, através de chamadas para métodos, tais como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>classe, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>

trans-unit.source: If a form has any child or owned forms, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event is also raised for each one.
trans-unit.target: Se um formulário tem qualquer elemento subordinado ou formulários pertencentes à empresa, uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>evento também é gerado para cada um.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>

trans-unit.source: If any one of the forms cancels the event, none of the forms are closed.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer uma dos formulários cancela o evento, nenhuma dos formulários são fechadas.

trans-unit.source: Therefore the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> events are not sent to any of the forms.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte correspondente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>eventos não são enviados para qualquer uma dos formulários.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: The FormClosingEventArgs class provides data for this event.
trans-unit.target: A classe de FormClosingEventArgs disponibiliza dados para este evento.

trans-unit.source: Two important members are the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> properties.
The event can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to true.
trans-unit.target: O evento pode ser cancelado, definindo o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade para verdadeiro.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property provides a reason why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>propriedade fornece um motivo por que razão o formulário está a ser fechado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The `closeReason` and `cancel` parameters are used to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O `closeReason` e `cancel` parâmetros são utilizados para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>Propriedades, respetivamente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"></xref> value that represents the reason why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"> </xref> valor que representa o motivo por que razão o formulário está a ser fechado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para cancelar o evento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica por que razão o formulário está a ser fechado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> can be closed because of a variety of reasons, both user-initiated and programmatic.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>pode ser fechado devido a uma variedade de motivos, iniciada pelo utilizador e programáticas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The CloseReason property indicates a reason for the closure.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CloseReason indica um motivo para o fecho.
